means: 显微镜照相的照片，显微照片

word_mean: 显微照片：在光学显微镜下观看的微小物体的照片，用普通照相的方法制作。参见microphotograph

sentence.Network_en: In practice this is done on an enlarged photomicrograph of the porous medium.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上这是在一张放大的多孔介质显微照片上进行的.

sentence.Network_en: This contrasts with the aerated lung on the right of this photomicrograph.
sentence.Network_cn: 右边是充满气体的肺组织.

sentence.Network_en: At low magnification, this photomicrograph reveals multiple granulomas.
sentence.Network_cn: 低倍镜显示了多个肉芽肿.
